docs.text: for a movie with such deep religious and spiritual undertones , it is surprising to find the messenger : the story of joan of arc such an ungodly mess .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in the early to mid 1400's , there was little in the way of spiritual light to be found shining from the heart of a man or woman .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the church was a dismally dark and oppressive place .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: france was involved in " the hundred years war " against england .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there was no strong political leadership in the country .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: morale was low , there being little hope for the future .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it was within this setting that a young french girl began hearing " voices " and seeing " visions . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: convinced that these were messages from god , she brazenly demanded to see the dauphin in order to deliver the message directly to him .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the message : if he would give her an army to command , she would deliver to him the crown .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he does . . .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and she does .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: then , once seated on the throne , he abandons her to her english captors .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: director luc besson ( the fifth element ) may have co-wrote the script but he never appeared to have a proper handle on the material .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the inconsistencies of the cast , the confusing blur of the violent battle scenes , the inappropriate musical score , and the lack of a vibrant life force at the center of the film adds up to a largely disappointing end product which is oftentimes unintentionally laughable .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his biggest miscue was to cast his wife , milla jovovich ( the fifth element ) in the title role .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ms . jovovich , looks spectacular as joan , clad in battle armor , astride a similarly protected horse .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if looks were enough to fully convey a character , she would have been brilliant .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: since it isn't , she tried ( and failed ) to act the part .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: her joan is unbalanced , " inspiring " the troops merely by screaming stridently and waving her banner or sword over her head like a woman possessed .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: john malkovich ( being john malkovich ) fares a bit better as the dauphin , who joan would see on the throne as charles vii .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: an easily manipulated man , his weakness of character foreshadows the betrayal of joan which would lead to her death .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: faye dunaway ( the thomas crown affair ) gives a strong performance in minimal screen time as the dauphin's mother-in-law and chief advisor .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the army under joan's command are comprised of comical figures , more stooges than soldiers .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the one exception would be tcheky karyo ( la femme nikita ) as dunois , the man who was leading the attack prior to joan's arrival .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: trying to plan a systematic campaign , he sees his leadership authority negated by joan's insistence on following her " visions . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: dustin hoffman ( sphere ) has a small inhuman role as joan's conscience which begins speaking to her while awaiting trial .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: dressed like cloaked monk , he leads her to doubt herself and her " revelations . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as well she should .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: scriptures do speak of revelation .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: god , via his gift of holy spirit , is able to communicate to men .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: three of the nine manifestations of holy spirit listed in 1 corinthians 12 deal with receiving revelation .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they are : word of knowledge , word of wisdom , and discerning of spirits .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: even the scriptures themselves are a result of god giving revelation to his " holy men . . .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: who spake as they were moved by holy spirit ( i . e .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: by revelation . ) "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but the scriptures also caution us :
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " beloved , believe not every spirit , but try the spirits whether they are of god : because many false prophets are gone out into the world . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: 1 john 4 : 1 [kjv]
docs.label: negative

docs.text: joan's end , ( being burned at the stake at the age of 19 ) , the frenzy ( mob rule ) and blood lust her inspiration wrought , and the death , pain , or suffering which followed her campaign all point to a devilish influence rather than a godly one .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while her conviction and intense believing remains an admirable quality , she was , as others have been before and since , misled by the spiritual master of deception .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as a messenger , she was quite effective .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: she was just confused as to whose message she was carrying .
docs.label: negative
